title: ShadowCash (SDC) Hits Market Capitalization of $517,629.00
content: ShadowCash (CURRENCY:SDC) traded 1.3% higher  against the dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM ET on June 2nd. During the last seven days, ShadowCash has traded 14.6% lower  against the dollar. ShadowCash has a market cap of $517,629.00 and $195.00 worth of ShadowCash was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One ShadowCash coin can now be purchased for approximately $0.0773 or 0.00001013 BTC on popular exchanges.    Here is how other cryptocurrencies have performed during the last 24 hours:        Crave (CRAVE) traded 4% lower  against the dollar and now trades at $0.21 or 0.00002795 BTC.  Bitswift (SWIFT) traded up 3.5% against the dollar and now trades at $0.58 or 0.00007658 BTC.  TeslaCoin (TES) traded 3.7% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0286 or 0.00000374 BTC.  Moin (MOIN) traded up 3.5% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0841 or 0.00001101 BTC.  Bitstar (BITS) traded up 2.6% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0103 or 0.00000135 BTC.  Ratecoin (XRA) traded down 4.4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0015 or 0.00000019 BTC.  Swing (SWING) traded up 1.8% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0534 or 0.00000699 BTC.  WINCOIN (WC) traded 0% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.32 or 0.00004157 BTC.  ClubCoin (CLUB) traded 1.7% lower  against the dollar and now trades at $0.36 or 0.00004722 BTC.  Hyper (HYPER) traded up 9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0188 or 0.00000246 BTC.   About ShadowCash     ShadowCash (SDC) is a PoW/PoS coin that uses the  Proof of Stake hashing algorithm. It launched on July 19th, 2014. ShadowCash’s total supply is 6,695,133 coins. ShadowCash’s official Twitter account is @SDCoin and its Facebook page is accessible here . The Reddit community for ShadowCash is /r/shadowcash and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here . ShadowCash’s official message board is talk.shadowproject.io . The official website for ShadowCash is shadowproject.io .  According to CryptoCompare, “Specification – Block Time: 60 seconds – Difficulty Re-target: every block – Nominal Stake Interest: 2% annually – Min Transaction Fee: 0.0001 SDC – Confirmations: 10 – Maturity: 500 – Min Stake Age: 8 hours – no max age – P2P Port: 51737 – RPC Port: 51736 “    ShadowCash Coin Trading    ShadowCash can be traded on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: YoBit.  It is usually not possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as ShadowCash directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to acquire ShadowCash should first purchase Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Gemini, GDAX or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to purchase ShadowCash using one of the exchanges listed above.
